label: 公卿
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Holders of the highest ranks of the court aristocracy; they sat in council as the government's highest decision-making body from the Heian period. (See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu) Includes three ministers (daijin), two counselors (nagon), and all of third (sammi) court rank. [大臣、納言、三位]
